WRITING.TITLE: Social Daddy - The Big Daddy of Social Media Management Software
WRITING.TEXT:
[Social Daddy Review](https://medium.com/@tommyphan/social-daddy-review-demo-d2d371645fc7) Social daddy is a multi-platform, social media promoting, and automation tool, designed to assist digital marketers, agencies and entrepreneurs manage and track their social media promoting efforts across major platforms as well as Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter, Tumblr and WordPress Blogs from one Central location. Comes complete with a virtual assistant chatbot.
Social Daddy Review Features
- Manage and respond to customer queries using Facebook Messenger Chat Bot - Receive Realtime message notification from your social media accounts. - Setup scheduled, auto post to Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, WordPress, Skype - Cross Delete your post at once from Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr WordPress - 1 click social share from one platform to the other - Manage Your Facebook pages ( with comment, reply ) groups ( with comment, reply ) - 1 Click Setup Facebook group post Campaign - Setup Comment Campaign to Drive Traffic - Facebook Mass message send to you page fans - Setup Scheduled auto post to Instagram Twitter Account Manage ( Sending direct message if available , reply , retweet ) - Twitter Mass message Your followers - Setup Retweet Campaigns Twitter Mass Reply - Get new leads from twitter using the Twitter Prospectr. - Auto respond to your team's queries and enquiries on Slack using the slack Bot - Manage and receive messages from Linkedin - Write, View and delete your WordPress post - Receive Notifications from Your accounts
Visit see more [Social Daddy Review](https://youtu.be/gs8t_uEwARg) Regard!
